sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Button } from 'reactstrap'

const TodoForm = ({ addTaskAndReset, task, setTask }) => {
  return (
    <form>
      <input
        type="text"
        value={task}
        onChange={setTask}
        placeholder="Napište úkol"
        className="m-2"
      />
      <button
        type="button"
        onClick={() => addTaskAndReset(task)}
        className="m-2"
        color="info"
      >
        Přidat úkol
      </button>
    </form>
  )
}

export default TodoForm
